Title: Relates to the weight and dimensions of vehicles carrying road salt
Summary: Provides that any vehicle which: has been issued a permit pursuant to subdivision 15 of section 385 of the vehicle and traffic law; is transporting road salt; and does not have a gross vehicle weight rating in excess of one hundred seven thousand pounds, shall be authorized to operate on all public highways and bridges at any time between the months of October and April.
LawCode: Amd ยง385, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to road salt
